General.Name: Clearmind Medicine Inc. Common Shares
General.Description: Clearmind Medicine Inc., a pre-clinical pharmaceutical company, develops novel psychedelic medicines to treat under-served health problems in Canada and internationally. It develops treatments for alcohol use disorders, binge drinking and eating disorders, as well as depression, binge eating, psychotherapy, mental health issues, and other binge behaviors. The company has a collaboration with Clearmind Medicine Inc. to conduct a study evaluating the companies combination treatment for obesity and metabolic syndrome. The company was formerly known as Cyntar Ventures Inc. and changed its name to Clearmind Medicine Inc. in March 2021. Clearmind Medicine Inc. was incorporated in 2017 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1220 West 6th Avenue, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6H 1A5
